generalQuestions.question: How do I reset my password?
generalQuestions.answer: To reset your password, go to the 'Forgot Password' section on the login page, enter your email, and follow the instructions sent to your inbox.

generalQuestions.question: Where can I find my job applications?
generalQuestions.answer: You can find your job applications in the 'Applications' section of your dashboard. All your active and past applications will be listed there.

generalQuestions.question: How do I contact support?
generalQuestions.answer: You can contact support through our 'Contact Us' page. Here's the link: [Contact Us](https://reelcareer.com/contact).

generalQuestions.question: How do I update my profile information?
generalQuestions.answer: To update your profile information, go to your 'Profile' section under account settings and edit the relevant fields.

generalQuestions.question: How do I apply for a job?
generalQuestions.answer: To apply for a job, browse the job listings, click on the job you're interested in, and then click 'Apply Now' to submit your application.

generalQuestions.question: What happens after I apply for a job?
generalQuestions.answer: After you apply for a job, your application will be reviewed by the employer. You'll be notified if you're selected for an interview or if your application is rejected.

generalQuestions.question: How do I change my job preferences?
generalQuestions.answer: To change your job preferences, go to the 'Job Preferences' section in your dashboard and update the categories, location, and job types you are interested in.

generalQuestions.question: How do I post a job?
generalQuestions.answer: To post a job, go to the 'Post a Job' section, fill in the required job details, and submit the form. Your job will then be listed in the job directory.

generalQuestions.question: What is the process to upgrade my membership?
generalQuestions.answer: To upgrade your membership, go to the 'Account Settings' section, select the membership plan you want to upgrade to, and follow the instructions for payment.

generalQuestions.question: How do I cancel my account?
generalQuestions.answer: To cancel your account, go to your account settings, find the 'Account Management' section, and follow the instructions for deactivating your account.

predefinedQuestions.question: How do I reset my password?
predefinedQuestions.answer: To reset your password, go to the 'Forgot Password' section on the login page.

predefinedQuestions.question: Where can I find my job applications?
predefinedQuestions.answer: You can view your job applications in the 'Applications' section of your dashboard.

predefinedQuestions.question: How do I contact support?
predefinedQuestions.answer: You can contact support through our 'Contact Us' page. Here's the link: [Contact Us](https://reelcareer.com/contact).

predefinedQuestions.question: How do I update my profile?
predefinedQuestions.answer: To update your profile, visit the 'Profile' section in your account settings.
